name: Vladen and The Peace Keeper V.1.8
name_original: Vladen and The Peace Keeper V.1.8
description:
NOTE: BRAND NEW/UPDATED!!!

Welcome to Vladen and The Peace Keeper! You play as Vladen, a man In the middle of a War of Robots. This game was more of a Test to see how I'd make games in the Future, I think I did a GREAT job for my VERY FIRST GAME, It's fine if you all think it's bad, but there be more games to come from me so STAY TUNED!!

CONTROLS:

To move, Press Arrow keys- Up, Down, Left, and Right!

To click on something, click the Corasponding Icon,  Whatever Icon It might be.
